queries.name: Paths from owned to high value targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE NOT a = b RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from owned to high value targets (unlimited)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a {owned: true})-[*1..]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE NOT a = b RETURN p

queries.name: All paths from owned to high value targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((a {owned:true})-[*1..5]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE NOT a = b RETURN p

queries.name: All paths from owned to high value targets (unlimited)

queryList.query: MATCH p = allShortestPaths((a {owned: true})-[*1..]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE NOT a = b RETURN p
MATCH p = shortestPath((a {owned: true})-[*1..3]->(b)) WHERE NOT a = b RETURN p
MATCH p = shortestPath((a {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(b)) WHERE NOT a = b RETURN p

queries.name: Simplified paths to domain admins (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a {enabled: true})-[r*1..10]->(b:Group)) WHERE b.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' AND a<>b AND (a:User OR a.Computer) AND NONE(rel in r WHERE type(rel)='CanRDP') RETURN p

queries.name: Simplified paths to high value targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a {enabled: true})-[r*1..5]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE a<>b AND (a:User OR a:Computer) AND NONE(rel in r WHERE type(rel)='CanRDP') RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(h {highvalue: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(h {owned: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(g:Group)<-[:MemberOf*1..]-(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE toUpper(g.name) CONTAINS 'ADM' OR toUpper(u.name) CONTAINS 'ADM' RETURN p
MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-525' RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(:User) RETURN p
MATCH (u:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE u.highvalue OR g.highvalue MATCH p = (:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(u) RETURN p

MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true})<-[:HasSession]-(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE c.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*?(2000|2003|2008|xp|vista|7|me).*?' AND NOT c.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND c.lastlogon > (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) RETURN p

queryList.title: Select user...
queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) RETURN u.name ORDER BY u.name
MATCH p = (:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(:User {name: $result}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true})-[:EnabledBy]->(:CA) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = shortestPath((o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true})) WHERE o<>t RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from owned to ADCS (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((o {owned: true})-[*1..10]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true})) WHERE o<>t RETURN p UNION MATCH p = shortestPath((o {owned: true})-[r*1..10]->(a:CA)) WHERE o<>a AND NONE(rel IN r WHERE type(rel) IN ['EnabledBy','Read']) RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC1 templates excluding DAs

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' WITH COLLECT(u) AS x MATCH p = shortestPath((o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true, `Client Authentication`: true, `Enrollee Supplies Subject`: true, `Requires Manager Approval`: false})) WHERE o<>t AND ((o:User AND o.enabled AND NOT o IN x) OR (o:Computer AND o.enabled) OR (o:Group AND NOT o.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' AND NOT o.objectid ENDS WITH '-519')) AND NONE(rel IN r WHERE type(rel) IN ['EnabledBy','Read','ManageCa','ManageCertificates']) RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC2 templates excluding DAs

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' WITH COLLECT(u) AS x MATCH p = shortestPath((o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true, `Any Purpose`: true, `Requires Manager Approval`: false})) WHERE o<>t AND ((o:User AND o.enabled AND NOT o IN x) OR (o:Computer AND o.enabled) OR (o:Group AND NOT o.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' AND NOT o.objectid ENDS WITH '-519')) RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC3 templates excluding DAs

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' WITH COLLECT(u) AS x MATCH p = shortestPath((o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true, `Enrollment Agent`: true, `Requires Manager Approval`: false})) WHERE o<>t AND ((o:User AND o.enabled AND NOT o IN x) OR (o:Computer AND o.enabled) OR (o:Group AND NOT o.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' AND NOT o.objectid ENDS WITH '-519')) RETURN p

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC4 templates excluding DAs

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' WITH COLLECT(u) AS x MATCH p = shortestPath((o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true})) WHERE o<>t AND ((o:User AND o.enabled AND NOT o IN x) OR (o:Computer AND o.enabled) OR (o:Group AND NOT o.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' AND NOT o.objectid ENDS WITH '-519')) AND NONE(rel IN r WHERE type(rel) IN ['EnabledBy','Read','ManageCa','ManageCertificates','Enroll','AutoEnroll']) RETURN p
MATCH (a:CA {`User Specified SAN`: 'Enabled'}) RETURN a

queries.name: Direct paths to ESC7 certificate authorities

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((o)-[r]->(a:CA)) WHERE o<>a AND ((o:User AND o.enabled) OR (o:Computer AND o.enabled) OR o:Group) AND NONE(rel IN r WHERE type(rel) IN ['EnabledBy','Read','Enroll','AutoEnroll']) RETURN p
MATCH (a:CA {`Web Enrollment`: 'Enabled'}) RETURN a
MATCH p = (o)-[:Enroll]->(:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true,`Client Authentication`:true})-[:EnabledBy]->(:CA {`Web Enrollment`:'Enabled'}) WHERE (o:User OR o:Computer OR o:Group) RETURN p

MATCH p = shortestPath((o)-[r]->(t:CertificateTemplate {Enabled: true, `Client Authentication`: true})) WHERE o<>t AND 'NoSecurityExtension' IN t.`Enrollment Flag` AND NONE(rel IN r WHERE type(rel) IN ['EnabledBy','Read','ManageCa','ManageCertificates']) RETURN p
MATCH (a:CA {`Enforce Encryption for Requests`: 'Disabled', `Request Disposition`: 'Issue'}) RETURN a

queries.name: Groups with admincount that are not high value

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group {admincount: true, highvalue: false}) WHERE (o:User OR o:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from users excluding DAs to high value targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' WITH COLLECT(u) AS x MATCH p = shortestPath((a:User {enabled: true})-[*1..5]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE NOT a IN x AND NOT a = b RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from users excluding DAs (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' WITH COLLECT(u) AS x MATCH p = shortestPath((a:User {enabled: true})-[*1..3]->(b)) WHERE NOT a IN x AND NOT a = b RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from computers excluding DCs to high value targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c) AS x MATCH p = shortestPath((a:Computer {enabled: true})-[r*1..5]->(b {highvalue: true})) WHERE none(rel IN r WHERE rel:Contains OR rel:HasSession) AND NOT a IN x AND NOT a = b RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from computers excluding DCs (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c) AS x MATCH p = shortestPath((a:Computer {enabled: true})-[r*1..3]->(b)) WHERE none(rel IN r WHERE rel:Contains OR rel:HasSession) AND NOT a IN x AND NOT a = b RETURN p
MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:AdminTo]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(:Group)-[:AdminTo]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) RETURN p

MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true})-[:AdminTo|CanRDP|ExecuteDCOM|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT EXISTS { MATCH (u)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' } RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(:Group)-[:AdminTo|CanRDP|ExecuteDCOM|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT EXISTS { MATCH (u)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' } RETURN p

MATCH p = (:Computer {enabled: true})-[:AdminTo]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:Computer {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(:Group)-[:AdminTo]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:CanRDP]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Service accounts with paths to computers (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((:User {enabled: true, hasspn: true})-[*1..10]->(:Computer {enabled: true})) RETURN p

queries.name: Service accounts with paths to users (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((a:User {enabled: true, hasspn: true})-[*1..10]->(b:User {enabled: true})) WHERE NOT a = b RETURN p

MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:ReadLAPSPassword|SyncLAPSPassword|GenericAll|AllExtendedRights]->(:Computer {enabled: true, haslaps: true}) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[:ReadLAPSPassword|SyncLAPSPassword|GenericAll|AllExtendedRights]->(:Computer {enabled: true, haslaps: true}) WHERE NOT g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' AND NOT g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' RETURN p

MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:ReadGMSAPassword]->(:User {enabled: true}) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[:ReadGMSAPassword]->(:User {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' AND NOT g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' RETURN p

MATCH p = (o {enabled: true})-[:DCSync|AllExtendedRights|GenericAll]->(:Domain) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (o {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(:Group)-[:DCSync|AllExtendedRights|GenericAll]->(:Domain) RETURN p

queries.name: Objects with DCSync rights excluding DAs and DCs

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o {enabled: true})-[:DCSync|AllExtendedRights|GenericAll]->(:Domain) WHERE NOT EXISTS { MATCH (o)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' OR g.objectid='S-1-5-9' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' } RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (o {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(:Group)-[:DCSync|AllExtendedRights|GenericAll]->(:Domain) WHERE NOT EXISTS { MATCH (o)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' OR g.objectid='S-1-5-9' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' } RETURN p

queries.name: Users that can reset passwords excluding DAs (heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:ForceChangePassword]->(:User {enabled: true}) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[:ForceChangePassword]->(:User {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' AND NOT g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' RETURN p

queries.name: Users that can add members to groups excluding DAs

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:AddMember]->(:Group) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group)-[:AddMember]->(:Group) WHERE NOT g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' AND NOT g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' RETURN p
MATCH p = (:User)-[r]->(o) WHERE r.isacl RETURN p
MATCH p = (u:User)-[r]->(n) WHERE r.isacl AND u.admincount=false AND RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[:Owns]->(b) RETURN p

queries.name: Users or computers potentially with password in description

queryList.query: MATCH (x) WHERE (x:User OR x:Computer) AND toUpper(x.description) CONTAINS 'PASSW' OR toUpper(x.description) CONTAINS 'PW:' RETURN x

queries.name: Users or computers with custom SPNs

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c {enabled: true}) WHERE ANY (x IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE NOT toUpper(x) STARTS WITH 'HOST/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'WSMAN/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'RestrictedKrbHost/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'TERMSRV/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'DNS/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'GC/' AND NOT toUpper(x) STARTS WITH 'LDAP/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'MSSQLSvc/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'MSServerCluster/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'MSClusterVirtualServer/' AND NOT x STARTS WITH 'MSServerClusterMgmtAPI/') RETURN p

queries.name: Groups with local admin rights and without admincount

queryList.query: MATCH p = (g:Group)-[:AdminTo]->(:Computer) WHERE NOT g.admincount RETURN p
MATCH (c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE (c.lastlogon=0 OR c.lastlogon IS NULL) RETURN c

queries.name: Paths from outside tier 0 to disabled users

queryList.query: MATCH p = (a)-[r]->(b:User {enabled: false}) WHERE NOT a.tier0 AND r.isacl RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, hasspn: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, dontreqpreauth: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->({unconstraineddelegation: true}) RETURN p

MATCH (c1:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid='S-1-5-9' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c1) AS x MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c2 {unconstraineddelegation: true}) WHERE NOT c2 IN x RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(b) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(x) WHERE NOT x.allowedtodelegate IS NULL AND x.trustedtoauth=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(x) WHERE NOT x.allowedtodelegate IS NULL AND x.trustedtoauth=false RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[:AllowedToAct|AddAllowedToAct]->(b) RETURN p

queries.name: Linux servers potentially vulnerable to account name spoofing

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT toLower(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS 'windows' AND NOT toLower(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS 'mac os' AND NOT toLower(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS 'macos' RETURN p
MATCH (a:User)-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-525' WITH COLLECT(a) AS x MATCH (b:User {enabled: true, highvalue: true, sensitive: false}) WHERE NOT b IN x RETURN b
MATCH p = (:GPO)-[:GPLink]->(:OU)<-[:Contains*1..]-(:Domain) RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:GPO)-[:GPLink]->(:Domain) RETURN p

queries.name: Objects with direct paths against GPOs excluding DAs (heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' OR g.objectid ENDS WITH '-519' WITH COLLECT([u, g]) AS x MATCH p = shortestPath((a)-[]->(b:GPO)) WHERE NOT (a:User AND a IN x[0]) AND NOT (a:Group AND a in x[1]) AND NOT a = b RETURN p

MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c {enabled: true}) WHERE ANY (x IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE x STARTS WITH 'MSSQLSvc/' OR x STARTS WITH 'MSServerCluster/' OR x STARTS WITH 'MSClusterVirtualServer/' OR x STARTS WITH 'MSServerClusterMgmtAPI/') RETURN p UNION MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true})<-[:SQLAdmin]-(:User {enabled: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:User {enabled: true})-[:SQLAdmin]->(:Computer {enabled: true}) return p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:Group)<-[:MemberOf]-(:User) RETURN p

queries.name: Users that are member of a foreign group

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u:User)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE NOT u.domain = g.domain RETURN p

queries.name: Users with same name in different domain

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User), (u2:User) WHERE split(u1.name,'@')[0] = split(u2.name,'@')[0] AND NOT u1.domain = u2.domain AND toInteger(split(u1.objectid,'-')[7]) >= 1000 RETURN u1

queries.name: Objects in one domain that can do something to a foreign object

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((n)-[r]->(m)) WHERE NOT n.domain = m.domain RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[:Owns]->(b) WHERE a.domainsid<>b.domainsid RETURN p
MATCH p = (a)-[r]->(b) WHERE r.isacl AND a.domainsid<>b.domainsid RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from objects in owned domains to other domains

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain {owned: true})-[:Contains*1..]->(a)-[]->(b)<-[Contains*1..]-(:Domain {owned: false}) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users that never logged on

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE u.lastlogontimestamp IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users with last logon over 90 days ago

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT u.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND u.lastlogon < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users that never set a password

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users with password older than a year

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (365 * 86400)) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users with password change after last logon

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE (u.lastlogon > 0 AND u.lastlogon >= u.lastlogontimestamp AND u.pwdlastset > u.lastlogon) OR (u.lastlogontimestamp > 0 AND u.lastlogontimestamp >= u.lastlogon AND u.pwdlastset > u.lastlogontimestamp) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users with password not required

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, passwordnotreqd: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users with never expiring passwords

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: true, pwdneverexpires: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled users without logon since 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT u.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND u.lastlogon < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 60 * 60 * 24)) RETURN p
MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.name~='(?i)(ACCOUNT OPERATORS|SERVER OPERATORS|SCHEMA ADMINS)@' RETURN p

queries.name: Direct members of pre-windows 2000 compatible access group

queryList.query: MATCH p = (o)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE g.name STARTS WITH 'PRE-WINDOWS 2000 COMPATIBLE ACCESS@' RETURN DISTINCT p

queries.name: High value users that are not protected (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-525' WITH COLLECT(u) AS x MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true})-[:MemberOf*1..5]->(g:Group) WHERE (u.highvalue OR g.highvalue) AND NOT u IN x RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(:User {enabled: false}) RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 users with never expiring passwords

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, tier0: true, pwdneverexpires: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Tier 0 users without password change since a year

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(u:User {enabled: true, tier0: true}) WHERE datetime().epochseconds - u.pwdlastset > 60*60*24*365 RETURN p

MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE c.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*?(2000|2003|2008|xp|vista|7|me).*?' AND NOT c.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND c.lastlogon > (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE c.operatingsystem =~ '^(?i)Windows Server (2012|2016|2019|2022).*?' RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE c.operatingsystem =~ '^(?i)Windows (10|11).*?' RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT c.operatingsystem CONTAINS 'Windows' RETURN p

queries.name: Active computers without LAPS excluding DCs

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c) AS x MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true, haslaps: false}) WHERE NOT c IN x AND toUpper(c.operatingsystem) CONTAINS 'WINDOWS' AND NOT c.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND c.lastlogon > (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true, haslaps: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE c.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN p

queries.name: Enabled computers without logon since 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE NOT c.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] AND c.lastlogon < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 60 * 60 * 24)) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer {enabled: false})
MATCH (a:User) MATCH (b:User) WHERE a<>b AND NOT a.nthash IS NULL AND a.nthash=b.nthash MERGE (a)-[:SharesPasswordWith]-(b)
MATCH p = shortestPath((a:User {enabled: true, hasspn: true, cracked: true})-[*1..3]->(b)) WHERE a<>b RETURN p
MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true, cracked: true})-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE u.tier0 OR g.tier0 RETURN p
MATCH p = (u:User {enabled: true, cracked: true})-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE u.highvalue OR g.highvalue RETURN p
MATCH p = (a:User {enabled: true})-[:SharesPasswordWith]->(b: User {enabled: true, tier0: true}) WHERE a.tier0 IS NULL OR a.tier0=false RETURN p
MATCH p = (a:User {enabled: true})-[:SharesPasswordWith]->(b: User {enabled: true, highvalue: true}) WHERE a.highvalue IS NULL OR a.highvalue=false RETURN p
MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE toLower(u.samaccountname)=toLower(u.password) SET u.weakpassword=true RETURN u
MATCH (u:User {enabled: true, nthash: '31d6cfe0d16ae931b73c59d7e0c089c0'}) SET u.weakpassword=true RETURN u

queries.name: Users with passwords up to 4 chars

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE size(u.password) <= 4 SET u.weakpassword=true RETURN u

queries.name: Users with passwords up to 8 chars

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE size(u.password) <= 8 SET u.weakpassword=true RETURN u
MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE u.password IS NOT NULL AND u.description CONTAINS u.password RETURN u
MATCH (c:Computer {enabled: true}) WHERE c.password=toLower(left(replace(c.samaccountname, '$', ''), 14)) SET c.weakpassword=true RETURN c
MATCH (x:Group) WHERE any(y IN [512, 516, 517, 518, 519, 526, 527] WHERE x.objectid ENDS WITH '-' + toString(y)) SET x.highvalue=true, x.tier0=true RETURN x

MATCH (x:Group) WHERE any(y IN ['S-1-5-32-544', 'S-1-5-32-548', 'S-1-5-32-549', 'S-1-5-32-550', 'S-1-5-32-551', 'S-1-5-9'] WHERE x.objectid ENDS WITH '-' + y) SET x.highvalue=true, x.tier0=true RETURN x
MATCH (x:Group) WHERE any(y IN ['DnsAdmins'] WHERE x.name STARTS WITH toUpper(y + '@')) SET x.highvalue=true, x.tier0=true RETURN x

queries.name: Mark members of Tier 0 groups (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x)-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(y:Group {tier0: true}) WHERE (x:Group OR x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true, x.tier0=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark members of Tier 0 groups (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x)-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(y:Group {tier0: true}) WHERE (x:Group OR x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true, x.tier0=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (x)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(y:Group {tier0: true}) WHERE (x:Group OR x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true, x.tier0=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark members of valueable groups (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x)-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(y:Group {highvalue: true}) WHERE (x:Group OR x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark members of valueable groups (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x)-[:MemberOf*1..10]->(y:Group {highvalue: true}) WHERE (x:Group OR x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (x)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(y:Group {highvalue: true}) WHERE (x:Group OR x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (x:OU)-[:Contains*1..]->(y {tier0: true}) WHERE (y:OU OR y:Group OR y:User OR y:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true, x.tier0=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (x:OU)-[:Contains*1..]->(y {highvalue: true}) WHERE (y:OU OR y:Group OR y:User OR y:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p
MATCH (o {enabled:true, unconstraineddelegation:true}) SET o.highvalue=true RETURN o

queries.name: Mark computers with sessions of valuable users

queryList.query: MATCH p = (x:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y:User {highvalue: true}) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark objects in direct control of valuable objects

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((x)-[]->(y {highvalue: true})) WHERE x<>y SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark users and computers in control of valuable objects (3 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((x)-[*1..3]->(y {highvalue: true})) WHERE x<>y AND (x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p

queries.name: Mark users and computers in control of valuable objects (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((x)-[*1..5]->(y {highvalue: true})) WHERE x<>Y AND (x:User OR x:Computer) SET x.highvalue=true RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(y {tier0: true}) RETURN p UNION MATCH (p {tier0: true}) RETURN p
MATCH p = (:Domain)-[:Contains*1..]->(y {highvalue: true}) RETURN p UNION MATCH (p {highvalue: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Show users and computers violating Tier 0 (10 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((x)-[*1..10]->(y:Domain)) WHERE x<>y AND (x:User OR x:Computer) AND (x.tier0=false OR x.tier0 IS NULL) RETURN p

MATCH p = (u)-[:AZHasRole|AZMemberOf*1..]->(r:AZRole) WHERE r.displayname =~ '(?i)Global Administrator|User Administrator|Cloud Application Administrator|Authentication Policy Administrator|Exchange Administrator|Helpdesk Administrator|Privileged Authentication Administrator' RETURN p

queries.name: Users in privileged roles synced from on-prem

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u {onpremsyncenabled: true})-[:AZHasRole|AZMemberOf*1..]->(r:AZRole) WHERE r.displayname =~ '(?i)Global Administrator|User Administrator|Cloud Application Administrator|Authentication Policy Administrator|Exchange Administrator|Helpdesk Administrator|Privileged Authentication Administrator' RETURN p
MATCH (u {onpremsyncenabled: true}) RETURN u
MATCH (g:AZGroup {onpremsyncenabled: true}) RETURN g
MATCH p = (n)-[:AZOwns]->(:AZApp) RETURN p
MATCH (u:User {enabled: true}) WHERE toUpper(u.name) STARTS WITH 'MSOL_' RETURN u UNION MATCH (u:AZUser) WHERE toUpper(u.userprincipalname) STARTS WITH 'SYNC_' RETURN u
MATCH p = (n)-[:AZOwns|AZUserAccessAdministrator]->(:AZSubscription) RETURN p

queries.name: Principals without Azure role but with RBAC role User Access Administrator

queryList.query: MATCH (u) WHERE NOT EXISTS((u)-[:AZMemberOf|AZHasRole*1..]->(:AZRole)) AND EXISTS((u)-[:AZUserAccessAdministrator]->()) RETURN u

queries.name: Paths from users to high value targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((u:AZUser)-[r*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r)= 'GetChanges') AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r) = 'GetChangesAll') AND NOT u = n RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from users synced from on-prem to high value targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((u:AZUser {onpremisesyncenabled: true})-[r*1..]->(n {highvalue: true})) WHERE NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r) = 'GetChanges') AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r) = 'GetChangesAll') AND NOT u = n RETURN p

MATCH p = shortestPath((m)-[*1..]->(n:AZRole)) WHERE n.displayname =~ '(?i)Global Administrator|User Administrator|Cloud Application Administrator|Authentication Policy Administrator|Exchange Administrator|Helpdesk Administrator|Privileged Authentication Administrator' AND NOT m = n RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from applications to high value targets

queryList.query: MATCH p = shortestPath((m:AZApp)-[r*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE NONE (r IN relationships(p) WHERE type(r) = 'GetChanges') AND NONE (r in relationships(p) WHERE type(r) = 'GetChangesAll') AND NOT m = n RETURN p
MATCH p = (n)-[]->(:AZVM) RETURN p
MATCH p = (n)-[]->(:AZKeyVault) RETURN p
MATCH p = shortestPath((m)-[*1..]->(n:AZSubscription)) WHERE NOT m = n RETURN p

queries.name: Paths from principals without an Azure role but the RBAC role User Access Administrator to resources

queryList.query: MATCH p = (u)-[:AZUserAccessAdministrator]->(t) WHERE NOT EXISTS((u)-[:AZMemberOf|AZHasRole*1..]->(:AZRole)) RETURN u, p
MATCH p = shortestPath((u:AZUser)-[*1..]->(s:AZSubscription)) WHERE u<>s RETURN p

queries.name: Service principals with MS Graph app role assignments

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:AZServicePrincipal)-[:AZMGAppRoleAssignment_ReadWrite_All|AZMGApplication_ReadWrite_All|AZMGDirectory_ReadWrite_All|AZMGGroupMember_ReadWrite_All|AZMGGroup_ReadWrite_All|AZMGRoleManagement_ReadWrite_Directory|AZMGServicePrincipalEndpoint_ReadWrite_All]->(n:AZServicePrincipal) RETURN p
MATCH p = (n)-[:AZAddOwner|AZAddSecret|AZAppAdmin|AZCloudAppAdmin|AZMGAddOwner|AZMGAddSecret|AZOwns]->(g:AZServicePrincipal {appdisplayname: "Microsoft Graph"}) RETURN p
MATCH (n) WHERE NOT n.displayname='Microsoft Graph' WITH n MATCH p = shortestPath((n)-[*1..]->(g:AZServicePrincipal {appdisplayname: 'Microsoft Graph'})) WHERE n<>g RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest path from owned users to service principals

queryList.query: MATCH (u:AZUser {owned: true}), (m:AZServicePrincipal) MATCH p = shortestPath((u)-[*..]->(m)) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest path from owned users to managed identities

queryList.query: MATCH (u:AZUser {owned: true}), (m:AZServicePrincipal {serviceprincipaltype: 'ManagedIdentity'}) MATCH p = shortestPath((u)-[*..]->(m)) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest path from all users to managed identities

queryList.query: MATCH (u:AZUser), (m:AZServicePrincipal {serviceprincipaltype: 'ManagedIdentity'}) MATCH p = shortestPath((u)-[*..]->(m)) RETURN p
MATCH (sp:AZServicePrincipal) RETURN sp
MATCH (sp:AZServicePrincipal {serviceprincipaltype: 'ManagedIdentity'}) RETURN sp
